definitions.text: quantifier; used with either mass nouns or plural count nouns to indicate an unspecified number or quantity
relatively much but unspecified in amount or extent
examples: he was still some distance away

definitions.text: relatively many but unspecified in number
examples: they were here for some weeks
we did not meet again for some years

definitions.text: (of quantities) imprecise but fairly close to correct
examples: I've had about all I can stand
we meet about once a month
20 or so people were at the party
